trans-unit.source: Contributes an object-specific interception sink on the server end of a remoting call.
trans-unit.target: 在遠端呼叫的伺服器端提供特定物件的攔截接收。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IContributeObjectSink> interface is implemented by context properties in a <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context> class that want to contribute an object-specific interception sink on the server end of a remoting call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IContributeObjectSink>介面由內容屬性中實作<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context>想要參與特定物件攔截接收伺服器端的遠端呼叫的類別。

trans-unit.source: The server object chain is composed from those context properties in the server object's context that implement <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IContributeObjectSink>.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器的物件鏈結由伺服器物件的內容中實作這些內容屬性<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IContributeObjectSink>。

trans-unit.source: [[\<topic://cpconjust-in-timeactivation>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f7a7912-93cd-4c94-824f-42554c17c8d4) is an example of such a property; that is, the message sink would activate the object after the call arrives, and then pass the message on to the object.
trans-unit.target: [[\<topic://cpconjust-in-timeactivation >] ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6f7a7912-93cd-4c94-824f-42554c17c8d4)是這類屬性; 也就是訊息之後呼叫抵達時，接收會啟動物件，然後傳遞訊息物件的範例。

trans-unit.source: The server object which provides the message sink that is to be chained in front of the given chain.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器物件，其提供要鏈結到指定鏈結前面的訊息接收。

trans-unit.source: The chain of sinks composed so far.
trans-unit.target: 到目前為止所撰寫的接收鏈結。

trans-unit.source: Chains the message sink of the provided server object in front of the given sink chain.
trans-unit.target: 將提供之伺服器物件的訊息接收鏈結到指定接收鏈結的前面。
